title: Is It Time to Reconsider ‘Fasted Training’? New Study Calls into Question the Craze for Low Carb
content:
Team Sky caused a stir with its fasted and low-carbohydrate training strategies, but new findings add fuel into the high-carb revolution that's shifting pro cycling.

Read the full article at Is It Time to Reconsider ‘Fasted Training’? New Study Calls into Question the Craze for Low Carb on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
